info.brief_description: X-Men, New Recruits and others end up in diapers. How and why is up to you
info.description:
This is an interactive story. Each choice will have a chapter of the story. When you reach a chapter that has yet to be filled... make an addition!

Guidelines

I will try to do a storyline in which both male and females de-age but this will mostly focus on girls.

No swearing or racial slurs, please!

Only de-aging, mental regression, loss of bowel and bladder control, diaper fetishes and that sort of thing please.

Have fun!
